      Methods in org.apache.cassandra.db.context with parameters of type CounterId 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.nio.ByteBuffer CounterContext.createGlobal(CounterId id, long clock, long count)
      Creates a counter context with a single global, 2.1+ shard (a result of increment).
      java.nio.ByteBuffer CounterContext.createRemote(CounterId id, long clock, long count)
      Creates a counter context with a single remote shard.
      int CounterContext.findPositionOf(java.nio.ByteBuffer context, CounterId id)
      Finds the position of a shard with the given id within the context (via binary search).
      ClockAndCount CounterContext.getClockAndCountOf(java.nio.ByteBuffer context, CounterId id)
      Returns the clock and the count associated with the given counter id, or (0, 0) if no such shard is present.
      void CounterContext.ContextState.writeGlobal(CounterId id, long clock, long count) 
      void CounterContext.ContextState.writeLocal(CounterId id, long clock, long count) 
      void CounterContext.ContextState.writeRemote(CounterId id, long clock, long count)
